name: InCopy Document Preset File
summary: Learn about .ICST files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: To create a new ICST file, select File → Document Presets → Define..., click New..., choose your settings, name your preset, click OK, click Save, name the presets file, choose the save location, and click Save.
To open your ICST file, select File → Document Presets → Define..., click Load..., navigate to your file, select it, and click Open.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
